posts.title: Chasing Certifications

posts.description: As we get towards the end of the year, I get the itch that most people get - the urge to get new certifications.

posts.title: Crossplane, a Kubernetes-powered IAC Tool
posts.author: Marty Henderson
posts.description: Crossplane is an infrastructure-as-code tool that manages your infrastructure as Kubernetes objects and keeps state within Kubernetes, leveraging controllers and extensions for various cloud providers and their object types.
